Name: TypeOfWeighting
Description: Allows brief identification of Weighting Process used with the option of using a controlled vocabulary.

Name: Description
Description: Full description of the weighting process. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.

Name: WeightingMethodologyReference
Description: A reference to the methodology used for the weighting process.

Name: AnalysisUnit
Description: The entity to which the weights apply, for example, individuals, families or households, groups, institutions/organizations, administrative units, etc. Supports the use of an external controlled vocabulary.

Name: UsageGuide
Description: A guide to the appropriate usage of the weights generated by the processing event.

Name: StandardWeight
Description: A standard weighting factor used by all or a group of variables within the data set.
